Package com.bakdata.dedupe.classifier

Class RuleBasedClassifier.RuleBasedClassifierBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bakdata.dedupe.classifier.RuleBasedClassifier.RuleBasedClassifierBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the record.
    Enclosing class:
    RuleBasedClassifier<T>
    public static class RuleBasedClassifier.RuleBasedClassifierBuilder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder for RuleBasedClassifier with convenience methods to create positive and negative rules.

    • Method Detail

      • positiveRule

        public RuleBasedClassifier.RuleBasedClassifierBuilder<T> positiveRule​(@NonNull
                                                                      @NonNull java.lang.String name,
                                                                      @NonNull
                                                                      @NonNull java.util.function.BiPredicate<T,​T> condition,
                                                                      @NonNull
                                                                      @NonNull SimilarityMeasure<? super T> similarityMeasure)
        Creates a positive rule that is applied only when the precondition holds. Following rules are only evaluated if the similarity is either SimilarityMeasure.unknown() or 0. If the precondition fails, RuleBasedClassifier.Rule.doesNotApply() is returned and the following rules are evaluated.

        Positive rules result in Classification.DUPLICATEs.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the rule for lineage/debugging.
        condition - a predicate for left and right input.
        similarityMeasure - the similarity measure of this rule.
        Returns:
        this

                                                                      @NonNull java.lang.String name,
                                                                      @NonNull
                                                                      @NonNull SimilarityMeasure<? super T> similarityMeasure)
        Creates a positive rule that is always applied. Following rules are only evaluated if the similarity is either SimilarityMeasure.unknown() or 0.

        Positive rules result in Classification.DUPLICATEs.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the rule for lineage/debugging.
        similarityMeasure - the similarity measure of this rule.
        Returns:
        this

      • negativeRule

        public RuleBasedClassifier.RuleBasedClassifierBuilder<T> negativeRule​(@NonNull
                                                                      @NonNull java.lang.String name,
                                                                      @NonNull
                                                                      @NonNull java.util.function.BiPredicate<T,​T> condition,
                                                                      @NonNull
                                                                      @NonNull SimilarityMeasure<? super T> similarityMeasure)
        Creates a negative rule that is applied only when the precondition holds. Following rules are only evaluated if the similarity is either SimilarityMeasure.unknown() or 0. If the precondition fails, RuleBasedClassifier.Rule.doesNotApply() is returned and the following rules are evaluated.

        Negative rules result in Classification.NON_DUPLICATEs.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the rule for lineage/debugging.
        condition - a predicate for left and right input.
        similarityMeasure - the similarity measure of this rule.
        Returns:
        this

                                                                      @NonNull java.lang.String name,

        Negative rules result in Classification.NON_DUPLICATEs.

        Parameters:

        similarityMeasure - the similarity measure of this rule.
        Returns:

      • thresholdRule

        public RuleBasedClassifier.RuleBasedClassifierBuilder<T> thresholdRule​(@NonNull
                                                                       @NonNull java.lang.String name,
                                                                       @NonNull
                                                                       @NonNull java.util.function.BiPredicate<T,​T> condition,
                                                                       @NonNull
                                                                       @NonNull SimilarityMeasure<? super T> similarityMeasure,
                                                                       double threshold)
        Creates a threshold rule that is applied only when the precondition holds. Following rules are only evaluated if the similarity is SimilarityMeasure.unknown(). If the precondition fails, RuleBasedClassifier.Rule.doesNotApply() is returned and the following rules are evaluated.

        Threshold rules result in Classification.DUPLICATEs if sim >= threshold and in Classification.NON_DUPLICATE if sim < threshold.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the rule for lineage/debugging.
        condition - a predicate for left and right input.
        similarityMeasure - the similarity measure of this rule.
        threshold - the threshold that discriminates duplicates and non-duplicates
        Returns:
        this

      • thresholdRule

        public RuleBasedClassifier.RuleBasedClassifierBuilder<T> thresholdRule​(@NonNull
                                                                       @NonNull java.lang.String name,
                                                                       @NonNull
                                                                       @NonNull SimilarityMeasure<? super T> similarityMeasure,
                                                                       double threshold)
        Creates a threshold rule that is always applied. Following rules are only evaluated if the similarity is SimilarityMeasure.unknown().

        Threshold rules result in Classification.DUPLICATEs if sim >= threshold and in Classification.NON_DUPLICATE if sim < threshold.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the rule for lineage/debugging.
        similarityMeasure - the similarity measure of this rule.
        threshold - the threshold that discriminates duplicates and non-duplicates
        Returns:
        this

      • defaultRule

        public RuleBasedClassifier.RuleBasedClassifierBuilder<T> defaultRule​(@NonNull
                                                                     @NonNull SimilarityMeasure<? super T> similarityMeasure,
                                                                     double threshold)
        Creates a threshold rule named "default" that is always applied. By convention, this should be the last rule that is evaluated if no other rules applied.

        Threshold rules result in Classification.DUPLICATEs if sim >= threshold and in Classification.NON_DUPLICATE if sim < threshold.

        If the similarity measure returns SimilarityMeasure.unknown(), the defaultClassificationResult is returned.

        Parameters:
        similarityMeasure - the similarity measure of this rule.
        threshold - the threshold that discriminates duplicates and non-duplicates
        Returns:
        this
